title: Remaining individual T206 now reduced - discount for larger purchases
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: Remaining individual T206 now reduced - discount for larger purchases
posts.post_content:
ALL Remaining cards have been REDUCED between 6 to 16% below original price.

I have the following raw T206 cards available for sale.  A decent portion of them are bright, attractive cards, but have a small mark or two on bottom front border, which will be noted in the listing by '*'.  Any 'hidden' defects (for example tears or pinholes) not obvious on the scan will also be noted.  Scans of individual cards are available, just contact me.

All prices include shipping.  Check or Paypal (regular, not F/F) are fine. Discounts are available for larger purchases, as follows:

$50 to $99 total order  -5%
$100 to $199   -10%
$200 or more   -15%

Thanks, and enjoy the T206 eye candy.

Brian

posts.post_title: Price reductions on all remaining T206 cards
posts.post_content:
I have reduced pricing on all the remaining T206 cards, as well as changed the discount structure to the following:

$50 to $99 total order  -5%
$100 to $199  -10%
$200 and over  -15%

Thanks to all for the previous sales, and happy T206 shopping.

Brian

I decided that instead of a friendly bump I would post a hostile bump to get my message across with precision. :mad:!!   The original pricing on all remaining cards has been reduced from between 6 to 16%.  The listings have been updated to reflect recent sales.  That is all, and please don't attempt to make me crack a smile, or I might get all Judge Landis on you.

Brian
